entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries. Blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 13 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
